Ice and Mustex were on thier final aproach to Maximal city when the attack =
began. "Look out" Mustex yelled diving off of his hoverbike and tackleing I=
ce as some sort of energy beams passed by. Ice had spotted the mental signa=
tures but passed them off as someone that belonged here. The two hit the gr=
ound hard sliding and leaving a skidmark across the dirt. 

"Thank you." Ic=
e replied as she shook the dirt out of her feathers. Transforming first to =
her polar bear mode she prepare for battle. With a quick thought a the bear=
s head flipped down to it's chest revealing her robot head. Her owl wings f=
olded back and she was finally ready. Her appearance was a robot head on a =
polar bears body and owl wings on her shoulders. She now had the best atrib=
utes of her two beast modes. "We have to protect the city!" she exclaimed a=
s a ball of energy draining stasis energy appeared in her paws. Stepping fo=
rward she fired it toward Jume.

Mustex raised his rifle and scanned the ar=
ea like the good soldier that he was, "I detect 10- 12 signatures attacking=
." He knew he was up against outstanding odds but as a Maximal it was his j=
ob to fight. Checking his weapon one last time he stepped out from around t=
he corner and fired 5 pulse blasts at Decapitron.
